instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1502: What is A1502? A1502 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years Mid 2014, Late 2013, Early 2015 with EMC 2875, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-3476, 820-3536, 820-4924..
definitions.820-4924: What is 820-4924? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: macbook pro <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1502</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> board no <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-a....TOUCHPAD AND KEYBOARD NOT WORKING
threads.message:
hi sir....
i have a macbook pro <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1502</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>...part no is <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-a...the problem is keyboard and touchpad not working

voltages in keyboard connector
pin no4:- 3.42v
      no30:-3.3 v
what next....?

threads.title: macbook pro <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1502</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> board no <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-a....TOUCHPAD AND KEYBOARD NOT WORKING
threads.message:
KB can't work until TP works properly.
Can you access boot menu, or Internet recovery?

threads.title: macbook pro <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1502</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> board no <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-a....TOUCHPAD AND KEYBOARD NOT WORKING
macbook pro <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1502</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> board no <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-a....TOUCHPAD AND KEYBOARD NOT WORKING
threads.message: I trying to load internet recovery and also boot menu.... But no progress.....what next??

threads.title: macbook pro <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1502</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> board no <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-a....TOUCHPAD AND KEYBOARD NOT WORKING
threads.message:
So not working before, nor after log into macOS.

Check F4800 and L4803.
